TopicTitle: Is there a workaround for the landing gear offset problem?

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to build a basic airplane from the first unlocked plane parts, basic non retractable landing gears, but every time I try to move them after placement they jump inside the the fuselage. 

 

Is there a workaround for this ? I can't build any airplanes right now
I experienced the same problem and I solved it by doing the 'undo' command and immediately moving the part again which did not cause the jump.
